name: Improved Readability - Arxiv.org
description:
Greatly improves the readability of arxiv.org, making it much easier to browse and navigate.
This does not make any major changes to the look and feel of the site, it simply makes it much easier to read through the site.

Improves the browse results screen, adding clear separation of entries, properly highlighted headings and a more aesthetic design.

The code is fully commented.
